level.heading: SUBMISSION OF BIDS[COLON] GENERAL PROVISIONS (ยง 30-2220)

level.text: To be considered for award, a bid shall be required to comply in all material respects with the IFB.
Bids shall be filled out, executed, and submitted in accordance with the instructions in the IFB.
Bids shall be submitted so that they will be received in the office designated in the IFB not later than the exact time set for opening of bids.
